reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: GATA Panama DECO OY2. PR4539082 Swat duty equipment and supplies. Probation Reform Support in Georgia. GATA Information Redacted DECO OY2. Colombia Aviation Services. Frank Hefferman - PSC Security field Advisor 7/1/. INL SGI visit - Feb 24-March 04, 2016.. US Cargo Control - Straps needed to secure aviatio. VAT - purchases and services

description.narrative: Combat transnational terrorism, especially from al-Qa'ida, its affiliates, and adherents using a strategic counterterrorism approach that focuses on 1) countering violent extremism; 2) building the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutions to address threats within their own borders; and 3) building stronger relationships with our partners around the world – in order to engage in a broader, more comprehensive counterterrorism effort that treats civilian institutions, to include the justice sector and law enforcement, as a critical part of building effective partner capacity to counter terrorism.

This award strives to combat transnational terrorism, counter violent extremism, build the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutuions, and build stronger relationships with our partners around the world. This includes Information has been redacted in accordance with the two principled exceptions defined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act (FATAA) of 2016: the health and security of implementing partners, and the national interest of the United States.. Train, Eval & Oth Related Act. TRAIN, EVAL & OTH RELATED ACT[Covers miscellaneous contractual services not otherwise classified under Miscellaneous/Other Contractual Services.].
